title: CHAN Cheuk Kin | Game, Animation
chameleon_description: A survival horror game where you collect items in a forest, while being hunted down by a shape-shifting monster.
procedural_generation_description: All geometries and placements of environmental assets were randomly procedurally generated. (Textures were downloaded online)
model_assets_description: Other assets were modelled and animated in Blender by myself.
monster_lore_a: A shape-shifting monster lives in the depths of the woods...
monster_lore_b: Morphing into a rock to avoid being spotted...
monster_lore_c: And strikes when the time comes...
pivot_description: A casual game where you fight off monsters by only manipulating the pivot point to move around.
